name: John's Lemon Hotel
description:
Help  John  Lemon  escape  from  this  creepy  hotel  he  got  himself  stuck,  just  be careful  a  step  here  might  be  your  last  one.


Enjoy this spooky hotel with amazing sound effects in the background. What ? Did you hear something ? It sounds like a ghost ?! Better hide somewhere.

The assets that are used in this game are provided by unity.

If you are interested in how I made this game you can check the latest unity tutorial at unity.learn.
